sicken.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to make you feel shocked and angry, especially because you strongly disapprove of something
sicken.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The thought of such cruelty sickened her.
All decent people should be sickened by such a pointless waste of life.
sicken.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The older people just sickened and died as food supplies ran low.
